en.name: Thundering Fury
en.4p: Increases DMG caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Superconduct, and Hyperbloom by 40%, and the DMG Bonus conferred by Aggravate is increased by 20%. When Quicken or the aforementioned Elemental Reactions are triggered, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

zh.name: 如雷的盛怒
zh.4p: 超载、感电、超导、超绽放反应造成的伤害提升40%，超激化反应带来的伤害提升提高20%。触发上述元素反应或原激化反应时，元素战技冷却时间减少1秒。该效果每0.8秒最多触发一次。
